      • removedMappedTexture

        public ITexture removedMappedTexture(java.lang.String pID)

      • loadTexture

        public boolean loadTexture(ITexture pTexture)
        Parameters:
        pTexture - the ITexture to be loaded before the very next frame is drawn (Or prevent it from being unloaded then).
        Returns:
        true when the ITexture was previously not managed by this TextureManager, false if it was already managed.

      • loadTexture

        public boolean loadTexture(GLState pGLState,
                  ITexture pTexture)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Must be called from the GL-Thread.
        Parameters:
        pGLState -
        pTexture - the ITexture to be loaded right now, if it is not loaded.
        Returns:
        true when the ITexture was previously not managed by this TextureManager, false if it was already managed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • unloadTexture

        public boolean unloadTexture(ITexture pTexture)
        Parameters:
        pTexture - the ITexture to be unloaded before the very next frame is drawn (Or prevent it from being loaded then).
        Returns:
        true when the ITexture was already managed by this TextureManager, false if it was not managed.

      • unloadTexture

        public boolean unloadTexture(GLState pGLState,
                    ITexture pTexture)
        Must be called from the GL-Thread.
        Parameters:
        pGLState -
        pTexture - the ITexture to be unloaded right now, if it is loaded.
        Returns:
        true when the ITexture was already managed by this TextureManager, false if it was not managed.
